name: James Salazar
text: Service was great food was excellent very friendly staff I recommend this Pizza hut out of all the Pizza huts I've ate at this was the best

text: Food was good! A little unprofessional behind the counter but they are teenagers so ehhhh

name: Jeannie Niten
text: One of my favorite pizza stops you can't beat pizza hut  my personal suggestion would be the 20 box with light sauce unless you like alot of sauce <3

name: amanda altice
text: Just got delivery. All 4 pizzas were dry, very little sauce and meat. The sauce and meat was only in the middle of the pizzas. Pretty disappointing.

name: Carli C
text: Yo what happened?! The crust was terrible and they really slacked on the sauce. I know we are going through tough times but at least keep the food you are able to serve decent for the rest of us.

name: Susan Kelly
text:
They were very nice...15-20 for the food,had time to go check on a prescription....timed just right....they texted
me while leaving the drug store! The curb service seems
to work well, but we still .miss coming inside....🤗🇺🇸🌞

name: Winter Schafer
text: Our waiter was very nice and helpful. He did a great job. Our radiator went out and had to get it fixed then stopped in to eat afterwards and the staff there was all nice place was clean. Food was good as well. Thank you for all your kind words. God bless y'all..

name: Mia Bauguess
text: Food is always good,however the bathroom needed tending. As for my service.... I was pleasantly surprised! My server was a young gentleman by the Name of Hunter; HE WAS VERY GOOD AT HIS JOB IN ALL WAYS. Attentive, courteous, and professional but sociable and friendly

name: Chris Trivette
text: Cheese is now an ingredient in pizza... Not a topping. So they want to charge extra for if you want extra cheese. This is one of the reasons why other pizza places will still be in business when Pizza Hut is long gone.

name: Becky Tarlton
text: Waited over 45 minutes to be served burned pizza. Placed it on the table like it was perfect. Two other tables were seated after us. They were served about 10 minutes before us. Also they were not busy in the restaurant. Could have had call ins...but we were in house waiting to be fed....will not go back.

name: Greg Hale
text: John is the best. Food is outstanding

name: SHELBEAUTY FERRELL
text: Nice people & quick service

name: Velvet Nance
text: Not good They were remodeling and had a bad burning paint smell that got on us and in our lungs all over our clothes and hair smell pretty bad don't go

name: Angela Eldridge
text: Staff very professional and quiet. When ask question answered I dont know.  They need to be more informed about products and services. They should go ask someone that does know. The food was really good. Price$. Location great seen from highway.

text: Fast and hot always I personally have always had a good Experience here small town that many places to eat

text: Hunter and Brianna needed to be repeated on the order. Had issues with them in the past and this is the last time our order was messed up. I'm having my service elsewhere instead of here for now on. Worst experience and the food was …More

text:
All you can eat buffet. But no pizza  but almost no pizza on the buffet.
Arrived at lunch (12:05pm) three small pieces of pizza.  The pasta tray was also almost empty.  Two bread sticks.   They brought out three more pizzas but the …More

name: mayesk33
text: Save yourself A LOT of time and just don't go. After sitting for 20 minutes within even being acknowledged, we finally flagged down someone to just order drinks.  Another hour and 15 minutes later, after asking 3 times, watching plenty of …More

text: Pizza was awesome. Staff was nice but a little unorganized. Good experience though.

text: Pizza was raw. My family dined in.  Young supervisor has a chip on his shoulder and said if I didn’t like the pizza I could order dominos rather than fix a cooked pizza. Also before this time, I used to try to take my daughter to the lunch …More

name: Karessa Megan
text: Food okay at best. Run down inside. Windows are all filthy. Lamps over the table are covered in dust. Sounds like a bunch of teenagers are working there, the bickering and immaturity. Some of the staff are polite, others not so much.

name: Joel Keating
text: My waitress Taylor was extremely pleasant, prompt and accurate. I thoroughly enjoyed my meal here!

name: Shelby Reynolds
text: The food was good but the service was lacking.  The manager along with all the staff were gone except one waitress and a cook.  The waitress was a little rude while the manager was gone.  When the manager came back she turned into a …More

text: It was cooked just like I like it. I made the mistake ordering something extra this time but I'll fix that next time. It was very good. I also had a salad and it was very good

text: Needs updating. Seems kinda run down. Salad bar was nearly empty. Not much food on budget. Empty food trays and pizza pans setting out and not cleaned up. Don't care to stop here again.

name: Simon Mcdowell
text: Its been a while since I ate there so i gave it a try, BIG MISTAKE , repeatedly watched what turned out to be the manager  "Hunter" wipe his nose with his bare hands then without washing them he would handle food, the Sanitation rate was 97.5, I recommend if looking for pizza in the Yadkin county area to try anywhere else but there.

name: Sheila Fleming
text: Recommend going early lunch for better selection & hotter food! Mom seems to be enjoying the pizza and the company was great!!! Oh, good service staff also @ Yadkinville store!

name: Mike Quach
text: Always in love with pizza hut. Services not too much.

name: Parker Freeman
text: I wanted to take advantage of a deal that required me to order online. But at the time I didn't have internet access. So the woman took my order over the phone and I still got my deal. Yummy pizza, but no Wi-Fi.

name: Melinda Snow
text: Pizza hut been around for years, regardless of how many more they open, nothing beats pizza huts crust n personal pan pizzas

name: Mr. & Mrs. Bricker
text: Yadkinville Pizza Hut has excellent wings.  We get them to go and they are always high quality and larger than the wings at many of the other local restaurants.  Staff is always friendly too.

text: This place is dispicaple, extremely rude manager and nasty all together. We received our bill before our food and was brought to go boxes before recieving our food. Half of the order was 30 minutes late to the table. The manager who took …More

name: Mickey Martin
text: If you order cheese sticks make sure that you request they take them out of the oven early, otherwise they will be burnt. This is the only Pizza Hut that I have ever seen this issue with but after 5 burned orders I started requesting early …More

name: Zachary holland
text: Someone knows what they're doing

text: My friends & I eat there once or twice a month for lunch. Always great food & service. We've had the pizza's, salads & wings mostly, always very good. Friendly employees from start to finish.

name: Gary C
text: Ordered bread sticks and pizza.  They forgot our pizza, 25 minutes into our visit.  Told them just forget it.  We'll go to Domino's instead.  Pizza Hut is not like it used to be.  Sad place.

name: Rebecca Gregory
text: Changed my raiting! 4 🌟 to 2! Last 2 time's were not good to say the least!

name: Sarah Hammer
text: Best pizza and wings ever! Go between the hrs of 11-4 Tues-Sun! Ask for Chasten!

text: We use takeout service, which is very efficient.  You can specify a time you need to pick up and the food will be ready and fresh -- and on time.

name: Beau Reichart
text: Very disappointed in the service. Waitress had to come back to table 3 times to verify our order and our drinks. Took about 30minutes for my drinks and we were the first to sit. Took about an hour to get the pizza and an hour and a half to …More

text: Great store and delicious food. I like the buffet however you might want to get water as tea while getting the buffet is $2.50.

name: Michael Thompson
text: Very slow service. 15 mins plus just to get a drink. When we ordered our 2 pizzas we also ordered wings, the server didn't put the order of wings on our ticket. We ask where our wings were at at and she said oh I forgot to put that on your …More
